page.title: 10CUB SCOUTS
page.content: For a few weeks we see if we like it and then we are invested, that means we become a Cub Scout. About twice a year we go camping. At the meetings we play games like "Pip,squeakand Wilfred To play it everyone sits in a circle and Arkala goes round tapping each person on the head saying Pip,Squeak and Wilfred until all the circle was done. Then Arkala calls out "Wilfred". All the boys whose heads were tapped when she said "Wilfred" run like mad round the circle. When she calls out "home" everyone runs back to where they started.We do an athlete,camping, cycling,swimming and many other badges. We went to Blackwell Court for our camping badge. We take part in Gang Shows and Christmas concerts also we run Fetes,Jumble Sales and Bazaars to raise funds for our pack or for charities.
